name: Ambush Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The drake has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the drake's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the drake surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
